results.content: Good History. Good information. Needs to be more pictorial for kids. Just seems a little dry in the delivery but information is grand.

results.content: If you're looking for a class and instructor that teaches you the how, when and why of basic C programming then this course is for you. Chaand doesn't waste time showwhen and why of basic C programming then this course is for you. Chaand doesn't waste time. He provides excellent instructions with simple, easy to follow examples. I highly recommend this course to any beginning C programmer.

results.content: The instructor is teaching the details of the C language that many others are leaving out.  He is regularly adding interesting content and is continually improving his fine course.  Chaand keeps his students informed with up-to-date messages and announcements.  And he seems to be a really nice guy.  Thanks Chaand!  Keep up the great work!

results.content: Great explanation, everything is straight-forward. Highly recommend! :)
